content: this is a summary of a civil case heard in the panevėžys district court the applicant who is the defendant in this case has been exempted from paying the costs of the proceedings the court made a final decision regarding the division of property in a divorce case the applicant was awarded the movable property including a car and the immovable property which was a loan the court also held the applicant responsible for a debt related to a mobile telephone service contract and ordered them to pay the defendant compensation the text discusses matrimonial property gift agreements succession and the right to compensation the applicant filed for divorce due to the defendants fault and requested to retain their married name and establish residence for their minor daughter they also sought monthly maintenance payments for their daughters support division of matrimonial property and financial compensation the court determined the value of the car and awarded it to the applicant while ordering the defendant to pay compensation the court ruled that certain debts were the applicants personal obligations and should be reimbursed the court also ordered the defendant to pay monthly maintenance for their daughter and allowed the dissolution of the marriage the court recognized debts owed to third parties and awarded the applicant a car as personal property the applicant was ordered to pay the defendant compensation and the remainder of the application was dismissed
